title: A Critic Takes On Cannes: Highlights (And Lowlights) Of The 2015 Festival
teaser: Critic John Powers returns from the French film festival to talk about this year's new international films. Top among his picks is The Assassin, a martial arts film by director Hou Hsiao-Hsien.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
